00060 const int NUM_INNER_ITERATIONS = 1;
00061 const double DEFAULT_MOVEMENT_FACTOR = 0.001;
00062 const bool CULLING_DEFAULT = true;
00063 const bool JACOBI_DEFAULT = false;
00064 
00065 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00066 
00067 UntangleWrapper::UntangleWrapper() 
00068   : qualityMetric( SIZE ),
00069     maxTime(-1),
00070     movementFactor( DEFAULT_MOVEMENT_FACTOR ),
00071     metricConstant( -1 ),
00072     maxIterations(-1),
00073     doCulling(CULLING_DEFAULT),
00074     doJacobi(JACOBI_DEFAULT)
00075 {}
00076 
00077 UntangleWrapper::UntangleWrapper(UntangleMetric m) 
00078   : qualityMetric( m ),
00079     maxTime(-1),
00080     movementFactor( DEFAULT_MOVEMENT_FACTOR ),
00081     metricConstant( -1 ),
00082     maxIterations(-1),
00083     doCulling(CULLING_DEFAULT),
00084     doJacobi(JACOBI_DEFAULT)
00085 {}
00086 
00087 UntangleWrapper::~UntangleWrapper()
00088 {}

00090 void UntangleWrapper::set_untangle_metric( UntangleMetric metric )
00091   { qualityMetric = metric; }
00092 
00093 void UntangleWrapper::set_metric_constant( double value )
00094   { metricConstant = value; }
00095 
00096 void UntangleWrapper::set_cpu_time_limit( double seconds )
00097   { maxTime = seconds; }
00098 
00099 void UntangleWrapper::set_outer_iteration_limit( int maxIt )
00100   { maxIterations = maxIt; }
00101 
00102 void UntangleWrapper::set_vertex_movement_limit_factor( double f )
00103   { movementFactor = f; }

00105 
00106 void UntangleWrapper::run_wrapper( MeshDomainAssoc* mesh_and_domain,
00107                                    ParallelMesh* pmesh,
00108                                    Settings* settings,
00109                                    QualityAssessor* qa,
00110                                    MsqError& err )
00111 {
00112   Instruction::initialize_vertex_byte( mesh_and_domain, settings, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00113 
00114   Mesh* mesh = mesh_and_domain->get_mesh();
00115 
00116     // get some global mesh properties
00117   SimpleStats edge_len, lambda;
00118   std::auto_ptr<MeshUtil> tool(new MeshUtil( mesh, settings ));
00119   tool->edge_length_distribution( edge_len, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00120   tool->lambda_distribution( lambda, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00121   tool.reset(0);
00122   
00123     // get target metrics from user perferences
00124   TSizeNB1 mu_size;
00125   TShapeSize2DNB1 mu_shape_2d;
00126   TShapeSize3DNB1 mu_shape_3d;
00127   TMixed mu_shape( &mu_shape_2d, &mu_shape_3d );
00128   std::auto_ptr<TMetric> mu;
00129   if (qualityMetric == BETA) {
00130     double beta = metricConstant;
00131     if (beta < 0) 
00132       beta = (lambda.average()*lambda.average())/20;
00133     //std::cout << "beta= " << beta << std::endl;
00134     mu.reset(new TUntangleBeta( beta ));
00135   }
00136   else {
00137     TMetric* sub = 0;
00138     if (qualityMetric == SIZE)
00139       sub = &mu_size;
00140     else 
00141       sub = &mu_shape;
00142     if (metricConstant >= 0) 
00143       mu.reset(new TUntangleMu( sub, metricConstant ));
00144     else 
00145       mu.reset(new TUntangleMu( sub ));
00146   }
00147     
00148     // define objective function
00149   IdealShapeTarget base_target;
00150   LambdaConstant target( lambda.average(), &base_target );
00151   TQualityMetric metric_0(&target, mu.get());
00152   ElementPMeanP metric( 1.0, &metric_0 );
00153   PMeanPTemplate objfunc( 1.0, &metric );
00154   
00155     // define termination criterion
00156   double eps = movementFactor * (edge_len.average() - edge_len.standard_deviation());
00157   TerminationCriterion inner("<type:untangle_inner>", TerminationCriterion::TYPE_INNER), 
00158     outer("<type:untangle_outer>", TerminationCriterion::TYPE_OUTER);
00159   outer.add_untangled_mesh();
00160   if (doCulling) 
00161     inner.cull_on_absolute_vertex_movement( eps );
00162   else
00163     outer.add_absolute_vertex_movement( eps );
00164   if (maxTime > 0.0) 
00165     outer.add_cpu_time( maxTime );
00166   inner.add_iteration_limit( NUM_INNER_ITERATIONS );
00167   if (maxIterations > 0)
00168     outer.add_iteration_limit(maxIterations);
00169   
00170     // construct solver
00171   SteepestDescent solver( &objfunc );
00172   solver.use_element_on_vertex_patch();
00173   solver.set_inner_termination_criterion( &inner );
00174   solver.set_outer_termination_criterion( &outer );
00175   if (doJacobi)
00176     solver.do_jacobi_optimization();
00177   else
00178     solver.do_gauss_optimization();
00179   
00180     // Run 
00181   qa->add_quality_assessment( &metric );
00182   InstructionQueue q;
00183   q.add_quality_assessor( qa, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00184   q.set_master_quality_improver( &solver, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00185   q.add_quality_assessor( qa, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00186   q.run_common( mesh_and_domain, pmesh, settings, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00187 }
00188 
00189 
00190 } // namespace MESQUITE_NS
